Package helperClasses

Class PathHandler

java.lang.Object
helperClasses.PathHandler
public class PathHandler extends Object
This is class finds files and directories related to the shell given path

  • Method Details

    • getDirectoryAndFileName

      public static DirectoryFileNameTuple getDirectoryAndFileName​(IShellState shellState, String path) throws Exception
      This method is used when trying to create or access some file or directory with the path. Gets the directory from which the file/directory is attempted to be created/accessed from and its name
      Parameters:
      shellState - holds state of the program including root directory and current directory
      path - is the specified path that indicates which file/directory is attempted to be created/accessed
      Returns:
      a tuple that holds directory from which the file/directory is attempted to be created/accessed from and its name
      Throws:
      Exception - if the given path is invalid

    • getFileSystemObject

      public static FileSystemObject getFileSystemObject​(IShellState shellState, String path) throws Exception
      This method is used when trying to access some file system object such as file or directory with the path.
      Parameters:
      shellState - holds state of the program including root directory and current directory
      path - is the specified path that indicates which file/directory is attempted to be accessed
      Returns:
      a the file system object indicated by path
      Throws:
      Exception - if the object does not exist at given path

    • getFileByPath

      public static File getFileByPath​(IShellState shellState, String path) throws Exception
      Get the file specified by path
      Parameters:
      shellState - holds state of the program including root directory and current directory
      path - is the specified path(complete or relative)
      Returns:
      path described by path
      Throws:
      Exception - if the path specified object at this path is not a file

    • getDirectoryByPath

      public static Directory getDirectoryByPath​(IShellState shellState, String path) throws Exception
      Get the directory specified by path
      Parameters:
      shellState - holds state of the program including root directory and current directory
      path - is the specified path(complete or relative)
      Returns:
      directory described by path
      Throws:
      Exception - if the path specified object at this path is not a directory
